string.name: Scan_access_tips
string.value: Grant the Camera permission in Settings > Apps & services > Scan Kit Demo > Permissions to enable the Camera permission.

string.name: demo_detail
string.value: The system-level scanning and Scan to Access services feature hardware and software synergy, helping you swiftly build barcode recognition and generation capabilities for a wide range of scenarios.

string.name: trip_barcode_tip
string.value: A ride code is created using a byte array. Input a byte array, represented as a hexadecimal string.

string.name: welcome_to_access
string.value: Welcome to the Scan to Access service

string.name: access_detail_info_f
string.value: In our daily lives, we often use various apps to scan a multitude of barcodes. The Scan to Access service revolutionizes this experience.

string.name: access_detail_info_t
string.value: Once developers have registered their domain names with the Scan to Access service, users can use system-level, always-available entry points like the Control Panel to scan a 1D or 2D barcode. This takes them directly to the corresponding service page of an app, providing a seamless, one-step experience.

string.name: access_detail_example_f
string.value: 1. Refer to the App Linking integration guide to register a domain name and generate a 2D barcode.

string.name: access_detail_example_t
string.value: 2. Scan the 2D barcode through the barcode scanning entry in the Control Panel.

string.name: access_detail_procedure1
string.value: 1. Register a domain name by referring to the App Linking integration guide.

string.name: access_detail_procedure2
string.value: 2. Configure the bundle name, domain name mapping, and app signature in the app project. (The project name should be the same as the bundle name.)

string.name: access_detail_procedure3
string.value: 3. Launch the barcode scanner in HarmonyOS (found in the Control Panel), and scan the 2D barcode provided by the app (this barcode is generated from the registered domain name).

string.name: access_detail_procedure4
string.value: 4. The installed app is started and the target service page is displayed.
